songs.title: Love Me, Leave Me*
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Love me, leave me
You thought you were getting out that easy
Love me, leave me
You thought you were getting out that easy
No, no, no-no
No, no, no-no
No, no, no-no
You thought you were getting out that easy

[Verse 1]
I don't even wanna talk if I can't hear your voice
I don't even wanna walk if you ain't by my side
Bought Balenciagas thinking of you, almost bought a pair in your size
I see the truth in your lies, I see the proof in your eyes
If loving you is wrong then I'm such a fool
I'ma be dumb 'til I die
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, I'm so damn scared
She fucks me on the electric chair
Death penalties, death melodies, ho
Not heavenly, not heavenly, ho

[Bridge]
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, I'm so damn scared
She fucks me on the electric chair
Death penalties, death melodies
Not heavenly, not heavenly, ho

[Chorus]
Love me, leave me
You thought you were getting out that easy
Love me, leave me
You thought you were getting out that easy
No, no, no-no
No, no, no-no
No, no, no-no
You thought you were getting out that easy

[Bridge]
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, I'm so damn scared
She fucks me on the electric chair
Death penalties, death melodies
Not heavenly, not heavenly, ho
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, I'm so damn scared
She fucks me on the electric chair
Death penalties, death melodies
Not heavenly, not heavenly, ho

[Chorus]
Love me, leave me
You thought you were getting out that easy
Love me, leave me
You thought you were getting out that easy
No, no, no-no
No, no, no-no
No, no, no-no
You thought you were getting out that easy
